title: By how much did DUOL's deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions increase during 2024? Express your answer in $ millions rounded to one decimal.
description:
Step 1: Identify the necessary formula for obtaining the change in deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions. In this case it is equal to 2024 Subscription Bookings - 2024 Subscription Revenue 
  
 Step 2: Find Subscription Bookings and Subscription revenue from Duolingo's FY 2024 Form 10-K, Item 7 (Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations):
 
 Subscription bookings = $730.737 million
 Subscription revenue = $607.531 million
 
 Step 3: Calculate the change in deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions using the formula 2024 Subscription Bookings - 2024 Subscription Revenue
 
 $730.737 million − $607.531 million = $123.206 million
 Rounded to one decimal place = $123.2 million

rubric.criteria: Identify the deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions formula as Formula: 2024 Subscription Bookings - 2024 Subscription Revenue
Find Subscription bookings from item 7 = $730.737 million
Find Subscription revenue from item 7 = $607.531 million
Rounded the difference to one decimal place = $123.2 million (Final Answer: $123.2 million)
